about_the_game:
WARNING: This game contains flashing lights, loud sounds, and lots of jumpscares.


Enter the world of Halloween Terror, where 1-5 players face a night of horrors. A ghostly spirit watches your every move and hears your voice. Collect items and try to escape before it gets you! Can you survive this terrifying hunt?

What is your challenge?

Halloween Terror takes place in an old abandoned time of a serial killer, where you can find several different items that will allow you to get out of the haunted house and also help you defend yourself against the killer who decides to kill you and maybe he even succeeds. Be careful though, the killer can hear your voice from the microphone, so you have to be quiet.

Can you do it?

  • Playability
    Halloween Terror has simple controls for surviving in the cornfield yet everything will be explained to you.

  • Online co-op for 1-5 players
    You can play Halloween Terror alone or together with your friends. Up to 5 of you can play together.

  • Repeatability
    The full version of Halloween Terror offers many different maps and game modes. You'll never find yourself running out of things to do, thanks to random events you'll be scared forever.

  • Game Modes and Difficulty
    In addition to several Halloween Terror maps, the full version also offers several game modes and difficulties.

  • Features in multiplayer mode
    Take advantage of voice chat that reacts to distance from others. Be careful though, the killer can hear you too and will come after you!

Multiplayer

In addition to the single player mode, Halloween Terror also offers multiplayer for up to 5 players. In some situations, you'll have to work together to survive this nightmare and escape without getting killed by the monster.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950/Radeon R7 370 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game should work even on worse components than those listed.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4590 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060/Radeon RX 580 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
